casebody.data:
STECK, Respondent, v. COLORADO FUEL & IRON CO., Appellant. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department January 12, 1894.) Action by Edward M. Steck against the Colorado Fuel & Iron Company.

Argued before VAN BRUNT, P. J., and O’BRIEN and PARKER, JJ.

Jas. Stikeman, for appellant. Geo. H. Adams, for respondent.

No opinion. Order affirmed, with $10 costs and disbursements.
